data.eml:eml: Hemitaeniochromis brachyrhynchus, a new species of cichlid fish from Lake Malaŵi, with comments on some other supposed members of the genus (Teleostei: Cichlidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliver, Michael K. (2012): Hemitaeniochromis brachyrhynchus, a new species of cichlid fish from Lake Malaŵi, with comments on some other supposed members of the genus (Teleostei: Cichlidae). Zootaxa 3410: 35-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213531
